info.name: GlobeTrotter Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for GlobeTrotter travel planning application with all endpoints and example requests

request.description: Register a new user account. Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and numbers.
Login with email and password to receive JWT token
Get currently authenticated user profile
Soft delete user account (sets isActive to false)

request.description: Create a new trip. Status is auto-calculated based on dates.
Get all user trips with pagination and optional status filter
Get detailed trip information including stops and activities

Reorder multiple stops in a single transaction
Schedule an activity for a trip stop
Search cities by name or country with fuzzy matching
Search activities with optional city/category filters
Get comprehensive budget breakdown by city, day, and category
Get user dashboard with upcoming trips, stats, and popular cities
Generate a public shareable link for the trip
View shared trip - PUBLIC endpoint (no auth required)
Get paginated community feed of shared trips
Duplicate a shared trip to your account with all stops and activities
